channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Blog
item.description: 1. git用来维护本地库 ![](_v_images/20200406143626884_5555.png =677x) 2. 初始化 mkdir file cd file git init ls -la 查看初始化的目录 .git ll .git 3. 设置签名 用户名：tom email：wr@qq.com 作用：区分不同开发人员 3.1. 项目级别 项目级别/仓库级别：仅在当前本地库范围内有效 git config user.name tom_pro git config user.email goodMorning_pro@atguigu.com 信息保存位置：./.git/config 文件 ![](_v_images/20200406145130351_6376.png =677x) ![](_v_images/20200406144637239_12232.png =677x) 3.2. 系统用户级别设置 ![](_v_images/20200406144806662_31095.png =677x) ![](_v_images/20200406144901544_25127.png =677x) ![](_v_images/20200406145057591_22861.png =677x) 若没有签名则会出错，见 4.4 git commit 4. 基本操作 4.1. git status ![](_v_images/20200406150751911_226.png =677x) 4.2. git add ![](_v_images/20200406151006119_21191.png =677x)
